thread.title: Stay for the Judo Grand Slam at AccorArena
thread.title_full: Stay for the Judo Grand Slam at AccorArena - Review of ibis Paris Bercy Village 12eme, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Iain R
title: Stay for the Judo Grand Slam at AccorArena
text: Great hotel in easy walking distance of the Venue. Staff extremely helpful. Great to have early check-in as I arrived on 6am Eurostar from UK. Situated near restuarants but food in hotel perfectly fine. Free Wifi with easy connection and good speed. Will certainly stay here again
